about.title: About Me
about.intro1: I'm Dave Ishii â€” a Fintech and AI entrepreneur with a background in pure mathematics, fashion business, and international market development.
about.intro2: As Founder & CEO of Kiara Inc., I build products that bridge technology and human experience, like the Kiara Translator app for multilingual teams.
about.intro3: Previously at Itochu Corp., I led global fashion brand expansions in Europe and Japan.
about.intro4: Today, I focus on Human-Finance Interaction research, digital identity (eKYC), and innovation at the crossroads of finance, AI, and business strategy.
about.intro5: I share insights regularly through publications, patents, and media, helping organizations navigate transformation with clarity and speed.

kiara.title: Founder & CEO
kiara.description: Kiara Translator is a real-time multilingual translation app designed for Slack, enabling seamless communication across language barriers within teams. It supports over 100 languages and integrates directly into Slack, automatically translating messages to enhance productivity and inclusivity.
kiara.feature1: Real-Time Translation: Messages are translated instantly within Slack, facilitating smooth conversations among team members who speak different languages.
kiara.feature2: Broad Language Support: Kiara supports over 100 languages, making it suitable for diverse, global teams.
kiara.feature3: User-Friendly Integration: As a Slack plugin, Kiara offers a straightforward setup with no hidden fees, allowing teams to start using it immediately without complex configurations.
kiara.feature4: Affordable Pricing: Kiara provides various pricing plans to accommodate different team sizes, starting at $30 per month for up to 10 users.
kiara.impact: Proven Effectiveness: Kiara has been utilized in significant projects, such as supporting 2,000 social innovators at MIT's global hackathon by translating Spanish and Portuguese, demonstrating its reliability in high-stakes environments.

liquid.title: International Sales Director
liquid.description: Liquid eKYC is a fully digital process that businesses use to verify a customer's identity online, without needing physical paperwork.
liquid.ekyc1: Fast and Easy: Customers can get verified quicklyâ€”usually within minutes, instead of days.
liquid.ekyc2: Lower Costs: Businesses save money because they don't have to handle paper documents or manual checking.
liquid.ekyc3: More Secure: It uses smart technology like face scans or AI to accurately confirm identities and reduce fraud.

cuusoo.title: Product Innovation Director
cuusoo.description: Spearheaded the revolutionary Cuusoo System, redefining innovation and community engagement in consumer electronics. Collaborated with TEPCO to develop cutting-edge home appliances inspired by user creativity, bridging the gap between ideas and market needs.

itochu.title: Sales Representative
itochu.point1: Developed strategic business initiatives and international market expansion for renowned global fashion brands, including Paul Smith (UK), Replay Jeans, Patrizia Pepe, Freddy, Richard Ginori (Italy), Essential (Belgium), and J.Lindeberg (Sweden).
itochu.point2: Successfully led cross-cultural projects and partnerships, working as an expatriate in the UK and Italy, driving brand growth and enhancing market presence across European markets.

add-translation.title: Can I add my original translation via Kiara?
add-translation.content: No. We cannot provide this feature at the moment. Since some customers asked us, we will try to implement this when we are ready.

annual-payment.title: Can I pay annually?
annual-payment.content:
Yes. You can pay either by card or invoice.

If you want to make a one-time payment for a specific period such as until the project ends, please contact us with [form](https://www.getkiara.com/contact) or at hello@kiara.team.

api-workflow-integration.title: Can we use Kiara as API and connect with Slack Workflow?
api-workflow-integration.content:
Sorry. Currently we do not sell translation API.

If you are interested in API access for integration with Slack Workflow or other systems, please contact us at hello@kiara.team to discuss your requirements.

before-install.title: What should I check before installing Kiara?
before-install.content:
You need to input the correct number of users in your Slack workspace. If the user number is incorrect, "Kiara might not work".

**Important Note**: If the actual number of people in your slack workspace is different from the number of people registered with Kiara, Kiara Translator may not work.

**Additional Information**:
- Previously, only one person was allowed to access the dashboard after sign-up
- As of August 5th, multiple people can now access the dashboard

bold-text.title: Is bold text translated as bold text?
bold-text.content: Yes, it is reflected (though some languages might not preserve bold formatting).

cancel-subscription.title: How can I cancel the subscription?
cancel-subscription.content:
We Are Sorry to See You Go!

To cancel subscription, please fill in [contact form](https://www.getkiara.com/contact) and will let you know after the cancellation has been done.

cannot-find-kiara.title: I cannot find Kiara after I install. What's wrong?
cannot-find-kiara.content:
If you cannot find Kiara after installation in your Slack workspace, you might have registered the wrong number of users in Kiara. If the actual number of people in your Slack workspace differs from the number registered with Kiara, the Kiara Translator may not work.

**Steps:**
1) Check how many users you have in your Slack workspace
   - See the user count on the #general channel

2) Change the user count at Kiara's dashboard

cannot-invite-kiara.title: I cannot invite Kiara to a channel. What should I do?
cannot-invite-kiara.content:
If you are in below situation, please try this way to invite Kiara:
- Cannot invite Kiara to a channel at all
- You could invite Kiara to #general channel but not for other channels
- An error occurs when inviting Kiara to a channel

**Solution**: Say "@kiara" in the message box to invite Kiara to a channel.

contact.title: How can I contact Kiara?
contact.content:
You have some ways to reach us:

- Chat by chat box on the bottom right on your screen
- Visit our [contact form](https://www.getkiara.com/contact)
- Reach us at hello@kiara.team
- You can also call or text us from phone/WhatsApp: +818063062223 or +80 9286 3531

correct-translation.title: Can I correct the translated result?
correct-translation.content: No. You cannot correct the translated result even if the translation was wrong. This is due to the limitation of Slack App. We hope Slack will change this in the future.

data-privacy.title: How do you keep or use customer data?
data-privacy.content:
Immediate data deletion policy - We protect our important customer's data privacy

Since the data privacy issue is becoming bigger in mass media and social media,

of course we do care our important customer concern.

As a CEO , I declare

We do not sell the data

We do not use the data for the AI training

We do not look at the data and immediately delete after processing the translation

We know many negative news are going around in the internet / TV about customer data privacy vs ChatGPT AI training.

As a mathematician and the founder of Kiara Inc,

my standpoint is very clear.

"Our customer is you" & "Our customer is not venture capital"

Dave Ishii, CEO Kiara Inc.

## How to delete a language

Say "@kiara" in the message box, press "Delete" button and select a language you want to delete.

invoice-payment.title: Can I pay by invoice?

kiara-doesnt-work.title: Kiara doesn't work. What should I check?
kiara-doesnt-work.content:
If Kiara does not work after install, check out the answer here.

If Kiara does not work in the following situation, try these procedures:
- You could invite Kiara to a channel but Kiara does not react

**Steps:**
1) Check how many users you have in your Slack workspace
   - See the user count on the #general channel

2) Change the user count at Kiara's dashboard

languages.title: What languages does Kiara support?
languages.content:
Kiara supports 100 languages. If the language you need is not on the list, please contact them via their [contact form](https://www.getkiara.com/contact) or email hello@kiara.team.

The comprehensive list includes major world languages like English, Spanish, Chinese, Arabic, French, as well as regional languages like Afrikaans, Basque, Cebuano, and Asian languages like Hindi, Japanese, Korean, Vietnamese, and European languages like German, Italian, Russian, Portuguese.

mentions-channels.title: Are mentions (@someone) and channels (#channel) translated properly?
mentions-channels.content:
**Mentions (@someone)**: Mentions are translated properly.

**Channels (#channel)**: Translated properly in some languages, shows differently in other languages.

message-length.title: Is there a limit on message length?
message-length.content: Yes. Maximum length is 5000 characters for a message.

mobile-use.title: Can I use Kiara on my mobile?
mobile-use.content: Yes. You can use Kiara on your mobile inside of Slack mobile app.

past-messages.title: Are past messages deleted if I cancel my subscription?
past-messages.content: No. If you cancel your subscription, Kiara will stop the translation. The past messages will not be deleted.

reinstall-kiara.title: How to re-install Kiara after technical problem
reinstall-kiara.content:
To re-install Kiara after experiencing technical problems:

1. Remove Kiara from your Slack workspace
2. Clear browser cache and cookies
3. Restart your browser
4. Follow the standard installation process again
5. Ensure user count matches your Slack workspace
6. Contact support if issues persist at hello@kiara.team

remove-kiara-app.content:
Removing Kiara is the same process as removing other Slack apps.

**Steps:**
1. Follow the [official Slack instructions](https://slack.com/help/articles/360003125231-Remove-apps-and-custom-integrations-from-your-workspace) for removing apps from your workspace

signin-issues.title: I could not sign-in or up. I see nothing after doing it
signin-issues.content:

**Solution:**
Ensure you're using the admin account that was used for initial signup and payment. For access issues, contact hello@kiara.team

signup-properly.content:

Below is valid way so please double check your way when your installed Kiara is not working properly.

Quick Start

To install Kiara to your slack workspace, you will need to access our website and click "Try create it free for 14 days" button on the top page. And follow the screen.

special-price-payment.title: How can you pay when you agreed a special price with Kiara customer support?
special-price-payment.content:
**For customers with customized pricing:**

1. Choose the plan: 1 person = $3/month (tentatively)
2. We will refund you $3 immediately
3. We will send you the agreed price payment URL separately

**Note:** This temporary selection allows us to set up your custom pricing correctly. Contact hello@kiara.team if you have questions.

status-consumption.title: What is 'Status' and 'Consumption'?
status-consumption.content:
## What is "Status"?

If you click "Status" button after you call Kiara by saying "@kiara" in the message box, the languages you set and the consumption will be shown.

## What is "Consumption"?

It shows the number of characters and the percentage you have used.

**Note**: As of Jan 2021, they are providing translation as "unlimited". So you do not have to worry about it!

translation-consumption-monitoring.title: Can we monitor translation consumption in real-time?
translation-consumption-monitoring.content:
Sorry. Due to the high traffic, we can not provide this dashboard as of Sep 2025.

Since some big customers consume 100M characters/month, technically we can not run SQL smoothly.

translation-function.title: How do I turn translation on or off?
translation-function.content:
## Turn on the translation function

Say "@kiara" in the message box, click "Setting" and turn on "Translation".

## Turn off the translation function

Say "@kiara" in the message box, click "Setting" and turn off "Translation".

translation-in-reply.title: What is 'Translation in reply' mode?
translation-in-reply.content:
When the timeline feels too noisy, users can activate "Translation in reply" mode to reduce timeline noise.

**To use the mode:**
1. Say "@kiara" in the message box to call Kiara
2. Click "Setting"
3. Set "Translation in reply"

translation-memory.title: Do you have 'translation memory' or 'glossary'?
translation-memory.content: No. If you need to download the result of translation or want to have such dashboard, we will consider to build it. Please tell us if necessary.

update-card.title: How do I update my credit card details?
update-card.content:
You can update your credit card details from the dashboard by following these steps:

1. Access the website and click the "sign in" button at the top
2. Authorize the app and access your info
3. After logging into the dashboard, click the "Plan Setting" button
4. Click the "Update Plan Setting" button
5. Fill in the Payment form and email address
6. Click "Update Plan and Payment"

workflow-translation.title: Can Kiara translate Slack Workflow?
workflow-translation.content:
Sorry. Currently we do not handle Workflow or bot translation.

**Why:**
This might cause an 'infinite loop' of translation when bot translates bot, leading to technical issues.

**Future Plans:**
When we come up with a nice solution, we will develop it and add it to our roadmap.

wrong-translation.title: The translation is wrong. What should I do?
wrong-translation.content:
Currently our customers say Kiara translation accuracy is 90%. We find that it is necessary to provide better translation in special terms, nuances etc. Since the translation is a core part of our service, we will keep improving it.

The company encourages users to report significant mistranslation issues through their:
- Contact Form
- Email: hello@kiara.team
